snippet: A group of 13 United States and foreign universities has teamed up with 2U, an online education provider, to offer online undergraduate summer courses.

byline.original: By THE INTERNATIONAL NEW YORK TIMES

lead_paragraph: A group of 13 United States and foreign universities has teamed up with 2U, an online education provider, to offer online undergraduate summer courses.

headline.main: A Summer Semester Online Offered by 13 Universities
headline.print_headline: A Summer Semester Online Offered by 13 Universities
